title: (SERIOUS TEAM) LFM: Kings eSports Club (Diamond+)
body:
**Kings eSports Club is looking to tryout players for next seasons team.**

**Minimum Requirements are**
- Diamond +
- Have Skype/TS
- Not be a tilt lord 
- Be able to take constructive criticism
- Willing to contribute to a healthy team environment 

The team is aiming to compete in the OOL (Oceanic Open Ladder) for 2016.
The team will have a coach/analyst and may start recruiting for more staff in the next couple of days, if you're interested, you can send me a message or the current captain a message.

**All players applying will be required to tryout, some things I will be looking for are**
Shot calling ability
Mechanics
Communication

**The team at this time looks like this**
Top:
Jungle:
Mid: Shok (Master)
ADC:
Support:

The team will be having team practice every Friday night, Saturday and Sunday during school time. 
During holidays, we will be trying to play as a team every time everyone is up. 

To Inquire about a tryout message me or the current captain on the client
Owner: MrNextgen (OCE) 
Current Captain: Shok (OCE)

replies.body: hey, a diamondV support main here, added you on the server :)
Master Tier ADC on 2 accounts, Virne or Virne1, would like to tryout
Ill add you on league man! :)
if your competing in the open ladder with hopes of making it to OPL, make sure memebers of your team are 17 and over otherwise they will not be able to compete ^^. Just giving advice

> 
Open Ladder and Challenger are open to everyone, however you need to be 17 to play in the Pro League

 Riot Benji  - about a year ago

Would love to tryout.
Diamond 5 Top Main
Okay man, ill talk to you on the client! :D

I will tryout ^_^
Diamond ADC main ~ DeathGod64
I play Trist/Vayne/Miss Fortune mainly
I'll add you on league and talk to you there dude!
